alert.note: Alert for Christian (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 11:58AM CDT until March 26 at 11:25AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Christian and Stone. * WHEN...Until 330 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1156 AM CDT, The Department of Transportation reported numerous road closures due to the 3 and 5.5 inches of rain that fell last night and this morning. An additional 0.5 to 1.0 inches of rain are possible through this afternoon, leading to continued flooding. - This includes the following low water crossings... Woods Fork at Woods Fork Road, Finley River at Johns Ford Road, Swan Creek at Swan Cave Road, Tin Can Hollow at Highway CC, Silver Lake Branch at Highway U, Bull Creek at Center Road and Tory Creek at Highway O. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
